full_summary:
## Rotary Chairs Notice

### Brief Description
Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for the Purchase, Delivery, and Installation of Office Seating.

### Notice Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-703-6006081
* **Solicitation Number:** J074110/A
* **Publication Date:** 2024-03-20
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-10T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-11
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-05-31

### Procurement Requirements

* **Product Category:** Office furniture (UNSpsc Code: *56101700)
* **Specific Product:** Rotary chairs and stools
* **Delivery Location:** Ottawa, ON

### Eligibility Criteria
Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have an active Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid.

### Procedure

* Suppliers who are not holders of a Supply Arrangement (SA) may submit a bid to the Identified User (IU), but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.
* The non-SA holders cannot be awarded a contract unless and until the SAA has issued an SA to that supplier for the products and services contained in the bid.

### Additional Information

* This procurement is set aside under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
* Only suppliers who have a valid Supply Arrangement Agreement can submit a bid. Suppliers can contact TPSGC.PARCNAmeublement-APNCRFurniture.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca to inquire about obtaining a Supply Arrangement Agreement.
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Susan Hall (Statistics Canada)
	+ Email: susan.hall@statcan.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (613) 882-2470
	+ Address: 150 Tunney's Pasture Driveway Ottawa, ON K1A 0T6
* Request for Information: Please submit your inquiry to Susan Hall, Statistics Canada.

### Attached Files

* [English Notice of Proposed Procurement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34472/en_rfp_j074110.pdf)
* [French Notice of Proposed Procurement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34472/fr_ias_j074110.pdf)
